TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawingAttributes extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: Specifies the appearance of a

span.span: Specifies the appearance of a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，以指定设置，如颜色、 宽度、 透明度、 和的触笔提示形状。Use the property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a . 使用属性指定用于添加到描边的绘制特性。Use the property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an . 只有之后添加进行更新的特性的更改显示。Only strokes that are added after the undergo change show the updated attributes. 笔画上已有的外观不会更改。The appearance of the strokes that are already on the does not change. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类不常在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用两个对象以模拟使用上相同的钢笔和突出显示。The following example demonstrates how to use two objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same . 该示例假定的 XAML 文件中的根元素是调用`root`。The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a called `root`. 它还假定没有调用`switchHighlighter`且事件连接到在此示例中定义的事件处理程序。It also assumes that there is a called `switchHighlighter` and that the event is connected to the event handler defined in this example. summary.span: Adds a custom property to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够添加到自定义属性对象。The method enables you to add custom properties to a object. 呈现自己描边，并希望提供额外信息时，这非常有用。This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加和检索自定义属性从对象。The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the object. 该示例将添加一个属性，该值指示是否对象是钢笔或突出显示。The example adds a property that indicates whether the object is a pen or a highlighter. 中的代码`ChangeColors_Click`事件处理程序将描边的新颜色呈现在上使用对象， `inkDA`。The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the that use the object, `inkDA`. 此示例假定有名为`inkCanvas1`，并且有两个对象命名的`inkDA`，和 `highlighterDA.`This example assumes that there is an named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.` [!code-csharp[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下因素影响的高度和宽度呈现时，但不是值属性。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 应用于触笔的压力量时绘制。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果你设置属性到 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP)，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假定你的应用程序具有调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: is .

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，调用方法的基类，以确保，注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, call the method for the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是处理事件的首选的技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event.

span.span: is .

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，调用方法的基类，以确保已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, call the method for the base class to ensure registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下因素影响的高度和宽度呈现时，但不是值属性。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 应用于触笔的压力量时绘制。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果你设置属性到 0 设备无关的像素 (DIP)，它将更改为 2 的 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中，通常不使用此属性。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假定你的应用程序具有调用`inkCanvas1`，和两个对象称为`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview.
